text: i rantu vibhagattinumitayil oru matiluntayirikkum. atinre mukalil cila manusyaruntavum. avarearearuttareyum tannalute atayalannalilute tiriccariyum. svargasthareat avar viliccuparayum: "ninnalkk samadhanam.” ikkuttar iniyum svargattil pravesiccittillattavaran. ateateappam atagrahiccukeantirikkunnavarum
